description: Source code for the HomeFragment class which implements a UI fragment displaying categories of videos (including optional 'Continue Watching' and 'Favorites' rows) with DPAD navigation handling for an Android TV app. Manages focus, user interaction, and updates via Kotlin coroutines and flows.

classes.name: HomeFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment displaying categorized video thumbnails with focus and navigation management, option for 'Continue Watching' and 'Favorites' rows, and handling user interaction for details and playback.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes views, sets up favorite flow collection, and key event handling.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Refreshes rows when returning to the fragment.

methods.name: refreshRows
methods.description: Updates the category rows, focus, and adapter based on current data.

methods.name: resolveFavorites
methods.description: Resolves favorite IDs to Video objects, maintaining order.

methods.name: getVideosForRow
methods.description: Retrieves videos for a specified row.

methods.name: getSelectedVideo
methods.description: Returns the video at a given row and column.

methods.name: isContinueWatchingRow
methods.description: Checks if a specific row is the 'Continue Watching' row.
